## \_sortByBool() function

Sort an array of objects by a boolean property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _sortByBool<T extends {}>(collection: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, prop: Prop<Immutable<T>>, trueFirst?: boolean): Immutable<T>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  collection | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; | An array of objects |
|  prop | Prop&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | The boolean property to sort by |
|  trueFirst | boolean | Set to true if false values should come last |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;T&gt;\[\]
